Package seng.monsters.model

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
seng.monsters.model.Monster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Monster.Doger, Monster.Eel, Monster.Quacker, Monster.Raver, Monster.Shark, Monster.Tree
public abstract class Monster extends Object implements Purchasable
An entity that can fight in a battle with a variety of stats

    A Quacker duck (Jack of all trades)

    Monster.Raver
    A Raver crab (Damage sponge, doesn't fight back well)
    static final class 
    Monster.Shark
    Definitely a shark (Hit hard, if it doesn't die first)
    static final class 
    Monster.Tree
    A Tree, that's it (Long lasting, always in full health before battle)
